channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 夏威夷正在考虑对游客征税，以抵消过度旅游对该州自然资源造成的损失
item.description: Hawaii is considering a tax on tourists as a means to offset the toll overtourism takes on the state’s natural resources on.wsj.com/49ioSKF on.wsj.com/49ioSKF

item.title: 一位精神科医生下载了一款赌博应用程序，以便在晚上放松心情。赌博公司让她不断下注，直到她输掉 40 多万美元。"你就是无法自拔"
item.description: A psychiatrist downloaded a gambling app to unwind at night. Gambling companies kept her betting until she lost more than $400,000. “You just can’t get out.” on.wsj.com/42HTFyg

item.title: 在 2024 年总统竞选活动中，出现了一种不太可能的侮辱："赫伯特-胡佛"
item.description: An unlikely insult has emerged on the 2024 presidential campaign trail: “Herbert Hoover” on.wsj.com/49aWj1T

item.title: 北约就像一张美元钞票：它的价值取决于人们对它的信任。现在，这种信念正受到唐纳德-特朗普的攻击。
item.description: NATO is like a dollar bill: Its value rests on the faith people put in it. Now that faith is under attack from Donald Trump. on.wsj.com/3SLkoFn on.wsj.com/3SLkoFn

item.title: 旧金山再次迎来科技复兴，因为企业家和投资者在离开其他城市后又重新回到了这里
item.description: San Francisco is once again experiencing a tech revival as entrepreneurs and investors return after decamping to other cities on.wsj.com/3UL7UAl on.wsj.com/3UL7UAl

item.title: 欧盟正在对 TikTok 进行调查，以查明这家社交媒体公司是否因未能充分保护未成年人和管理有害内容的风险而违反了欧盟新的在线内容规则。
item.description: TikTok faces an EU probe into whether the social-media company broke the bloc’s new online-content rules by failing to adequately protect minors and to manage the risks of harmful content on.wsj.com/3uGs9EQ on.wsj.com/3uGs9EQ

item.title: 小猫粪便财富女继承人拥有的加州海滨庄园即将以 8800 万美元的价格出售
item.description: A coastal California estate owned by the heiress to a kitty-litter fortune is coming on the market for $88 million on.wsj.com/4bHrCTw on.wsj.com/4bHrCTw

item.title: 鲜为人知的石油业特工组建了一个秘密贸易和航运帝国，将大量俄罗斯石油运往全球市场--躲避西方制裁
item.description: Little-known oil industry operatives assembled a clandestine trading and shipping empire that moves vast quantities of Russian oil to global markets—and sidesteps Western sanctions on.wsj.com/42JtLKo on.wsj.com/42JtLKo

item.title: 80 岁及以上的老人说，保持目标感是保持敏锐的关键。"我还有很多事情要做。
item.description: People 80 and older say maintaining a sense of purpose is key to staying sharp. “I still have a lot of stuff to do.” on.wsj.com/3HYWgdo on.wsj.com/3HYWgdo

item.title: 在一个肥胖问题严重的国家（提示：不是美国），Ozempic 灰色市场的不断扩大给监管带来了难题。
item.description: A growing gray market for Ozempic is posing a regulatory conundrum in a country with a serious obesity problem (Hint: It isn’t the U.S.) on.wsj.com/3I5t1FW on.wsj.com/3I5t1FW

item.title: 中国的肥胖人口比世界上任何地方都多，他们正越来越多地求助于减肥药物来解决这一问题
item.description: China has more obese people than anywhere else in the world, and they are increasingly turning to weight-loss drugs to solve the problem on.wsj.com/3wmUQqI

item.title: 街谈巷议事实证明，Nvidia 的下一个万亿美元目标比第一个万亿美元目标更容易实现。这并没有让这家冉冉升起的芯片制造商 "轻松上路"。
item.description: Heard on the Street: Nvidia’s next trillion dollars is proving easier than the first. That doesn’t exactly put the ascendant chip maker on Easy Street. on.wsj.com/3I6cjGI on.wsj.com/3I6cjGI

item.title: 以色列给哈马斯规定了斋月最后期限，要求其归还在加沙的人质，否则将在拉法发动地面进攻
item.description: Israel gave Hamas a Ramadan deadline to return the hostages held in Gaza or face a ground offensive in Rafah on.wsj.com/49lo9sc

item.title: 您在 2023 年兑现了 I 类债券吗？别忘了追查 1099 税表。
item.description: Did you cash in your I bonds in 2023? Don't forget to track down the 1099 for your tax return. on.wsj.com/3US5M9Q on.wsj.com/3US5M9Q

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼曾教导一代青年活动家从地方开始推动变革。这场运动已逐渐熄灭。
item.description: Alexei Navalny taught a generation of young activists to push for change, starting at the local level. That movement has steadily been extinguished. on.wsj.com/48lu9jw

item.title: 在价格暴跌和电动汽车销售势头放缓之后，锂和镍的生产商暂停了相关项目 via @WSJ
item.description: Producers of lithium and nickel have paused projects after prices collapse and momentum slows for electric-vehicle sales on.wsj.com/3V3abqX via @WSJ

item.title: 相互矛盾的饮食建议对改善美国人的健康状况几乎没有帮助。科学家们正在研究不同的人对不同饮食的反应。
item.description: Conflicting diet advice has done little to improve Americans’ health. Scientists are investigating how different people respond to different diets. on.wsj.com/3SI44W8 on.wsj.com/3SI44W8

item.title: 泰格-伍兹（Tiger Woods）最近一次简短的复出展示了他的局限性，同时也让人看到了昔日的神奇魅力。
item.description: Tiger Woods’s latest, abbreviated comeback showcased his limitations—and offered a flash of the old magic that still remains. on.wsj.com/3Ip18sR on.wsj.com/3Ip18sR

item.title: 美国和中国正在台湾以东加强航母演习，这一重要地区在任何东亚冲突中都会受到重视
item.description: The U.S. and China are stepping up aircraft-carrier exercises east of Taiwan, a vital region that would be prized in any East Asia conflict on.wsj.com/49jSgjW on.wsj.com/49jSgjW

item.title: 随着自动驾驶越来越接近现实，汽车设计师和科技公司正在更多地考虑人们如何使用汽车来工作
item.description: As automated driving gets closer to reality, car designers and tech companies are giving more thought to how people may use vehicles to work on.wsj.com/3I5K2zW

item.title: 香港的超豪华住宅已贬值超过四分之一。房价尚未触底。
item.description: Hong Kong’s superluxury homes have lost more than a quarter of their value. Prices haven’t hit the bottom yet. on.wsj.com/4bFs0SG on.wsj.com/4bFs0SG

item.title: 美国政府将向芯片制造商 GlobalFoundries 提供 15 亿美元的资助，用于在纽约和佛蒙特州建造和扩建设施。
item.description: The U.S. government is giving chip maker GlobalFoundries $1.5 billion in grants to build and expand facilities in New York and Vermont on.wsj.com/49hH4UN on.wsj.com/49hH4UN

item.title: 街谈巷议软银可能只有有限的时间来解决以 1,180 亿美元入股蓬勃发展的英国芯片设计公司 Arm 所带来的挑战
item.description: Heard on the Street: SoftBank may have limited time to solve the challenge presented by its $118 billion stake in the thriving British chip designer Arm on.wsj.com/3UQBuVj on.wsj.com/3UQBuVj

item.title: 拜登政府承诺向 GlobalFoundries 提供 15 亿美元的赠款，这是振兴国内半导体产业的第一笔大额赠款。
item.description: The Biden administration is pledging $1.5 billion in grants to GlobalFoundries in the first major award to revitalize the domestic semiconductor industry.

item.title: 劳伦-博伯特（Lauren Boebert）将在科罗拉多州的一个新选区竞选国会议员，分析人士预计该选区的共和党初选将十分激烈，难以预料。
item.description: Lauren Boebert is running for Congress in a new Colorado district—where analysts expect a hard-fought and unpredictable GOP primary race on.wsj.com/3T3TMRp on.wsj.com/3T3TMRp

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼曾教导一代青年活动家从地方开始推动变革。这场运动已逐渐熄灭。
item.description: Alexei Navalny taught a generation of young activists to push for change, starting at the local level. That movement has steadily been extinguished. on.wsj.com/3OOSYO1 on.wsj.com/3OOSYO1

item.title: 农历新年期间上路的中国游客比以往任何时候都多，但许多人的预算有限
item.description: More Chinese travelers hit the road during the Lunar New Year holiday than ever before, but many restricted themselves to shoestring budgets on.wsj.com/3ULMymq

item.title: 如果你认为每次锻炼都是一场大汗淋漓的狂欢，让你喘不过气来，那就大错特错了
item.description: If you think every workout has to be a sweat-fest that leaves you gasping for air, think again on.wsj.com/3UFpdCV on.wsj.com/3UFpdCV

item.title: 马瑙斯是亚马逊地区的一个大都市，这里的一位企业家正在探索如何带领游客深入丛林，亲眼目睹保护雨林的艰巨性。
item.description: An entrepreneur in Manaus, a sprawling metropolis in the Amazon, is on a quest to take travelers deeper into the jungle to see for themselves what’s at stake in protecting the rainforest on.wsj.com/48j3S5a on.wsj.com/48j3S5a

item.title: 一位护士用一辆高尔夫球车和一辆类似于 "奥斯汀-鲍尔斯"（Austin Powers）中的卡车的零件，制造了他那辆罕见的 1969 年斯巴鲁 360 电动车。
item.description: A nurse made his rare 1969 Subaru 360 electric with parts from a golf cart and a truck like the one in “Austin Powers” on.wsj.com/49GLjJE on.wsj.com/49GLjJE
